title: Podcast – Think digital, act human: the interview panel’s perspective

content.text: Here’s our 3rd episode of the second series of ‘Think digital, act human’.
We hear from Nettie Williams, Head of Community and Communications. You might recognise Nettie’s name because she’s also one of our podcast producers.

Nettie has been a civil servant for 22 years and has sat on several interview panels - for a variety of grade’s and roles. Here she shares her advice on how to get to the interview stage - and offers a unique perspective as a panel member.
Let us know what you think.
